summary: FAILED IGNITION SWITCH, INSERT CORRECT KEY INTO IGNITION SWITCH, TRY TO START, DOES NOT START DUE TO FAILED IGNITION SWITCH. VEHICLE THEFT DEVICE DOES NOT SENSE THE ELECTRONIC CHIP IN THE KEY. DOES NOT ALLOW MY TRUCK TO START. LOCAL DEALERSHIP CAN NOT CUT NEW KEYS NOR CAN THEY REPROGRAM THE IGNITION SWITCH OR THE VEHICLE THEFT DEVICE SINCE ISUZU MOTOR CORPORATION DOES NOT SUPPLY THEM WITH AND REPROGRAM SOFTWARE OR PROCEDURES.
